document_data.name: Lyrna Aster
document_data.mainbody: '''Lyrna Aster''' was a [[halfling]] [[rogue]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Lyrna had tanned skin, brown eyes, and dark brown hair tied back in a bun. She wore a suit of patchwork [[leather armor]] and had a pair of fancy [[dagger]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Lyrna joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|base camp]] at the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She served as a trainer for prospective sneaks and thieves at the camp.
